name: Fearless Aura

sections.name: Prerequisites
sections.description: Aura of courage class feature, caster level 8th.

sections.body: Your aura of courage expands to a 20-foot-radius emanation. Allies within the aura are immune to fear effects.
sections.name: Benefits

sections.body: The aura of courage affects each ally within 10 feet, and grants a +4 morale bonus on saving throws against fear effects.
sections.name: Normal

description: Your aura of courage becomes more potent, as your steadfast resolve is also manifested by your allies.
